text: aap kahiye ke wo kaun hai jo tum ko asman aur zamin se rizkh pahochata hai,ya wo kaun hai jo kano aur aankho par pora eqtiyar rakhta hai aur wo kaun hai jo zinde ko murde se nikalta hai aur murde ko zinde se nikalta hai aur wo kaun hai jo tamam kamo ki tadbir karta hai ?zaror wo yahi kahenge ke “Allah” to un se kahiye ke phir kyo nahi darte
